ModMetaData.description:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/buuPQel.png[/img] Update of Cozarkians mod https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2370445988
- Added support for [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1558635181]Gloomy Furniture[/url]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/CN9Rs5X.png[/img]
[table] [tr] [td][url=https://invite.gg/Mlie][img]https://i.imgur.com/zdzzBrc.png[/img][/url][/td] [td][url=https://github.com/emipa606/DressersHoldClothing][img]https://i.imgur.com/kTkpTOE.png[/img][/url][/td] [/tr] [/table]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/Z4GOv8H.png[/img] [b]***Destroy Any Dressers and End Tables Before Adding To An Existing Game***[/b]
Dressers and end tables are now storage. By default, they hold non-tainted apparel. They can be configured to store weapons, drugs, and textiles. To compensate, their beauty is reduced to 3 for dressers and 2 for end tables.
Integrates Vanilla Furniture Expanded - Core and Spacer Integrates [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/itemedittext/?id=2247819099]Tate's Tiny Furniture[/url]
Integrated With Deep Storage
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/itemedittext/?id=1617282896]LWM's Deep Storage[/url] is highly recommend, as it will cause items will be stored inside the dressers and end tables instead of on top. With deep storage, capacity is: [list] [*]End Tables - Max 4 light-weight items. [*]Dressers - Max 8 shirts or 4 parkas, can't hold power armor. [*]Wardrobe (Vanilla Furniture Expanded) - Max 16 shirts or 8 parkas or 2 power armor. [/list]
[b]***Destroy Any Dressers and End Tables Before Adding To An Existing Game***[/b]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/PwoNOj4.png[/img] [list] [*] See if the the error persists if you just have this mod and its requirements active.
